query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS system_prompts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  slug VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  category VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
  description TEXT,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  version INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  variables JSON,
  linkedAgents JSON,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  isSystem BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdBy INT,
  updatedBy INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX sp_slug_idx (slug),
  INDEX sp_category_idx (category)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS prompt_versions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  promptId INT NOT NULL,
  version INT NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  variables JSON,
  changeNote TEXT,
  changedBy INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX pv_prompt_idx (promptId),
  INDEX pv_version_idx (version)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ui_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `key` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  value JSON NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  updatedBy INT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS navbar_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  nameRu VARCHAR(128),
  icon VARCHAR(64),
  path VARCHAR(255),
  isEnabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  isCustom BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  displayOrder INT DEFAULT 0,
  externalUrl VARCHAR(512),
  openInNewTab BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX ni_order_idx (displayOrder)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS localization_strings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `key` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  locale VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  value TEXT NOT NULL,
  context VARCHAR(128),
  updatedBy INT,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX ls_key_locale_idx (`key`, locale),
  INDEX ls_context_idx (context)
);
